# 2024 West Virginia Commissioner of Agriculture election

| map_size = 275px
| map_caption = Leonhardt:
| title = Commissioner of Agriculture
| before_election = Kent Leonhardt
| before_party = Republican Party (United States)
| after_election = Kent Leonhardt
| after_party = Republican Party (United States)
}}
The 2024 West Virginia Commissioner of Agriculture election will take place on November 5, 2024, to elect the next commissioner of agriculture. Incumbent Republican commissioner Kent Leonhardt was re-elected with 69% of the vote.
Republican primary
Candidates
Nominee
*Kent Leonhardt, incumbent commissioner of agriculture
Eliminated in primary
*Joshua Higginbotham, former state delegate from the 13th district (2016â€“2021)
*Roy Ramsey, farmer and candidate for commissioner of agriculture in 2020
Results
}}

Candidates
Nominee
*Deborah Stiles, farmer
Results
}}
General election
Results
By congressional district
Leonhardt won both congressional districts.
